```java
$ mv httpd httpd-for-jk

```

```java
mod_cluster-1.2.6.Final/native/advertise$ ls buildconf
buildconf

```

```java
$ ./buildconf

```

```java
$ ./configure  --with-apxs=/packt/httpd/bin/apxs

```

```java
$ mv mod_advertise.so /packt/httpd/modules/

```

```java
LogLevel debug

```

```java
ServerName lb

```

```java
Include conf.d/*.conf

```

```java
/packt/httpd$ mkdir conf.d

```

```java
/packt/httpd/conf.d$ touch mod-cluster.conf

```

```java
LoadModule slotmem_module modules/mod_slotmem.so
LoadModule manager_module modules/mod_manager.so
LoadModule proxy_cluster_module modules/mod_proxy_cluster.so
LoadModule advertise_module modules/mod_advertise.so

```

```java
LoadModule proxy_module modules/mod_proxy.so
LoadModule proxy_ajp_module modules/mod_proxy_ajp.so
LoadModule proxy_http_module modules/mod_proxy_http.so
LoadModule ssl_module modules/mod_ssl.so

```

```java
<VirtualHost 10.0.1.32:80>
 <Directory />
 Order deny,allow
 Deny from all
 Allow from 10.0.1
 </Directory>
 <Location /mc>
 SetHandler mod_cluster-manager
 Order deny,allow
 Deny from all
 Allow from 10.0.1
 </Location>
</VirtualHost>

```

```java
<VirtualHost 10.0.1.32:6666>
 <Directory />
 Order deny,allow
 Deny from all
 Allow from 10.0.1
 </Directory>
 ServerAdvertise on http://10.0.1.32:6666
 EnableMCPMReceive
</VirtualHost>

```

```java
ServerAdvertise on http://10.0.1.32:6666

```

```java
AdvertiseGroup <some_other_multicast_addr:some_other_port>

```

```java
EnableMCPMReceive

```

```java
<subsystem >
    <mod-cluster-config advertise-socket="modcluster" connector="ajp">
        <dynamic-load-provider>
            <load-metric type="busyness"/>
        </dynamic-load-provider>
    </mod-cluster-config>
</subsystem>
```

```java
<socket-binding-group name="full-ha-sockets" default-interface="public">
  <socket-binding name="modcluster" port="0" multicast-address="224.0.1.105" multicast-port="23364"/>
</socket-binding-group>
```
